text: William Frank Reichart (born July 3, 1935) is a Canadian former ice hockey forward and Olympian. Reichart played with Team USA at the 1964 Winter Olympics held in Innsbruck, Austria.https://www.hockey- reference.com/olympics/athletes/bill-reichart-1 He also played for the Rochester Mustangs in the United States Hockey League, and in the International Hockey League for the Minneapolis Millers, and St. Paul Saints. ==Awards and honours== {| class="wikitable" ! Award ! title: Bill Reichart
